posts.post_content: Seldom was a card so explicitly sent off into retirement, see [Glorious Charge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glorious Charge) or even better [Kjeldoran War Cry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kjeldoran War Cry). If you prefer versatility try [Fortify](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fortify).
posts.html:
Seldom was a card so explicitly sent off into retirement, see Glorious Charge or even better Kjeldoran War Cry. If you prefer versatility try Fortify.

posts.post_content: The artwork isnt bad. We've got a lot going on here. The girl isn't particularly sexy or anything but not hideous either. The detail on the weapon and armor is cool. The moonlike symbols emanating out represent the bonus granted to fellow soldiers. Not the best art but not *bad*
